roleset.name: to make bone or like bone
roleset.note: OSSIFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'ossify' based on internet usage examples, expansion via VN. VerbNet entry 45.4, comparison with 'solidify.' (from ossify.01-v predicate notes)
OSSIFIED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from ossified.01-j)

example.name: No Agent
example.text: For permaculture-1 to remain alive - and *-1 not ossify into dogma - it must also change.

example.name: Arg1
example.text: Ossification of the posterior longitudinal ligament (OPLL) is a pathological process whereby the PLL becomes progressively calcified, often leading to symptomatic spinal canal or foraminal stenosis.
